name: SPACE DYNAMICS LABORATORY (SDL)
sampleDescriptions: SDL is a not for profit University Affiliated Research Center (UARC) for the Departments of Defense (DOD).  As such, SDL works closely with DOD and federal government as a trusted partner across military branches, the intelligence community and NASA.  SDL has a vested interest in the federal budget and appropriations processes, particularly related to Defense and CJS (NASA).  SDL supports myriad missions and programs across the federal government and its lobbying efforts pertain to these efforts.
NASA Science and Planetary Defense programs including: NEO Surveillance Mission (formerly NEOCam); Roman Space Telescope (formerly WFIRST); and PACE.
